summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6234 for the improvement of the alley in Block 13, West Side Heights Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by 37th Ave. Southwest, West Andover Street, 38th Ave. Southwest, Belvidere Ave. and West Charlestown Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89436, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
